entries.delete_all_mail_success: You have successfully emptied the mailbox of %TT.
entries.delete_all_mail_fail: Unable to empty the mailbox of %TT.
entries.confirm_empty_mail: Are you sure you want to delete all your email?
entries.err_waypoint_matches: You already have that waypoint in your datapad.
entries.err_waypoint_exists: You already have that waypoint in your datapad.
entries.help_browse_attach:
Attachments are displayed here.

You can right-click on an attachment to save it or use it.
entries.err_reply_system: You cannot reply to a Mail from the System.
entries.failed_unknown_prose:
An error has occurred on the chat server while sending the message to '%TT'.

Please try sending your message again, or contact Customer Service for assistance.
entries.subject: Subject
entries.recipient_invalid_prose:
Are you sure you have the correct name? 

There is no player named '%TT'.
entries.recipient_ignored_prose: Your Mail Message has not been delivered to '%TT' because the recipient has chosen not to receive mail from you at this time.
entries.err_no_subject: You need to enter a subject line for your message.
entries.err_no_recipients: You need to enter a name in the
field in order to send your message.
entries.err_no_body: You need to enter text in the body of  your message!
entries.failed_unknown:
An error has occurred on the chat server. 

Please try sending your message again, or contact Customer Service for assistance.
entries.err_bad_recipients:
field that  didn't make any sense. 

If you want to send a Mail Message to multiple people, simply put in their names separated by semicolons:

   John; Sally; Fred
entries.help_comp_body: The body of the mail message.
entries.help_comp_subject: The subject of the mail message can be typed here, if desired.
entries.help_comp_recipient:
This is the Mail composer.

The person or persons that should receive this mail.

You can send a mail to multiple people by separating their names with a semicolon (;).

You can send mail to your group by specifying 'group' as a recipient.
entries.help_comp_attach: This is where attachments go.  You can drag and drop waypoints into this window to send them to other people.
entries.help_browse_fwd: Forward the mail to someone else.
entries.help_browse_body: This is the body of the selected mail.
entries.help_browse_table:
This is your Mail Browser.

This window displays all the mail currently in your inbox. You can  write new messages and respond to messages sent to you.

This first table displays your inbox.
